name: Cross the Gap
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity -GB30 Game Jam

To celebrate the 30th anniversary of the Game Boy this jam has us making a game in the style of the said Game Boy.

Theme: "It's dangerous to go alone..."

Cross the Gap is a short tile movement puzzle game. You control both players and must get them safely to the door on the other side. Because if you only make it with one you will be alone... and that's dangerous.
